title: Process an Accelerated Death Benefit Claim
description: A life insurance policyholder has been diagnosed with a terminal illness and wants to access a portion of their death benefit while still living.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their policy includes an accelerated death benefit rider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the policy has the required rider.

tasks.description: Request medical documentation from a physician confirming the terminal diagnosis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the documentation needed to support the claim.

tasks.description: Once documentation is received, calculate and process the allowable benefit payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates and disburses the accelerated payment to the policyholder.
